messages.content: Hey, can you set a timer for 10 minutes?
Timer set for 10 minutes. I'll let you know when it's done.
Actually, make that 15 minutes instead.
Got it. I've updated your timer to 15 minutes from now.
Thanks. What time is it right now?
It's currently 2:47 PM.
Perfect, so the timer will go off at 3:02.
Exactly right. Your timer will go off at 3:02 PM.
What's the weather like today?
It's 72 degrees and sunny with light winds. Perfect day to be outside!
Should I bring a jacket if I go for a walk?
You probably won't need one. Maybe just a light sweater if you get cold easily.
What about tonight? Will it get chilly?
Tonight will drop to around 58 degrees. If you're staying out late, bring a light jacket.
Got it. What time is sunset today?
Sunset is at 7:34 PM today.
Call mom.
Calling mom now.
Wait, cancel that. I'll call her later.
Call cancelled. Would you like me to remind you to call her?
Yes, remind me at 6 PM tonight.
I'll remind you to call mom at 6 PM today.
Actually, make that 7 PM instead.
Updated. I'll remind you to call mom at 7 PM tonight.
Play some jazz music.
Playing jazz music from your library.
Turn the volume down a bit.
Volume turned down to 60%.
What song is this?
This is 'Take Five' by Dave Brubeck.
Skip to the next song please.
Skipping to next track. Now playing 'Blue in Green' by Miles Davis.
Add milk to my shopping list.
Added milk to your shopping list.
Also add bread and eggs.
Added bread and eggs to your shopping list.
What's on my list now?
Your shopping list has milk, bread, eggs, and bananas from yesterday.
Remove the bananas, I already got those.
Removed bananas from your shopping list. You now have milk, bread, and eggs.
Turn off all the lights.
All lights have been turned off.
